IMU Main Lounge

The Main Lounge is the perfect location for your wedding ceremony or reception of any size. The rental fee for the Main Lounge also includes the  use of the IMU Sun Porch and the IMU North River Terrace.

The Iowa Memorial Union is conveniently located in the heart of the University of Iowa campus, just blocks form downtown Iowa City. The IMU offers catering, an attached hotel, and event planning staff all located in the same building.

Our creative, award-winning chefs will help plan a unique menu especially for you. Let our experienced help make your wedding everything you expect it to be.

Features:

Capacity: 525

Venue is indoors
Air conditioning available

Extras :

Rental fee includes two outdoor spaces, the IMU Sun Porch and the IMU North River Terrace

Contact:

Kristen Becker
125 North Madison St.
Iowa City, IA 52242

319-335-3114
imu-eventservices@uiowa.edu.
Visit website →

  •   Facebook
“The Iowa House Hotel was the perfect place to stay for my Iowa City wedding. The rooms were bright and comfortable and had lots of space (and mirrors!) for my bridesmaids and I as we got ready on the big day. My wedding guests were especially happy about the free access to the sauna and steamrooms over at the University’s wellness center!"

Lauren Katalinich
